event.description: Denard Span grounds out to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.
Alexi Casilla strikes out swinging.
Joe Mauer strikes out swinging.
Justin Morneau grounds out, first baseman Miguel Cabrera to pitcher Rick Porcello.
Jason Kubel singles on a line drive to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Joe Crede grounds into a double play, shortstop Ramon Santiago to second baseman Placido Polanco to first baseman Miguel Cabrera. Jason Kubel out at 2nd.
Michael Cuddyer flies out to left fielder Josh Anderson.
Delmon Young walks.
Nick Punto flies out to left fielder Josh Anderson.
Denard Span flies out to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Alexi Casilla strikes out swinging.

Denard Span grounds out, second baseman Placido Polanco to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.
Alexi Casilla singles on a line drive to right fielder Clete Thomas.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Mike Redmond replaces Joe Mauer.
Mike Redmond grounds into a double play, shortstop Ramon Santiago to second baseman Placido Polanco to first baseman Miguel Cabrera. Alexi Casilla out at 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Brian Buscher replaces Justin Morneau.
Brian Buscher walks.
Jason Kubel singles on a fly ball to left fielder Josh Anderson. Brian Buscher to 2nd.
Joe Crede walks. Brian Buscher to 3rd. Jason Kubel to 2nd.
Michael Cuddyer grounds into a force out, shortstop Ramon Santiago to second baseman Placido Polanco. Joe Crede out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Nate Robertson replaces Rick Porcello.
Delmon Young reaches on a throwing error by shortstop Ramon Santiago. Delmon Young to 2nd.
Brendan Harris flies out to right fielder Clete Thomas. Delmon Young to 3rd.
Denard Span walks.
Alexi Casilla pops out to second baseman Placido Polanco.
Mike Redmond walks. Denard Span to 2nd.
Brian Buscher grounds out, second baseman Placido Polanco to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.
Jeff Larish remains in the game as the first baseman.
Pitching Change: Juan Rincon replaces Nate Robertson.

Placido Polanco walks.

Ramon Santiago doubles (2) on a line drive to right fielder Michael Cuddyer. Gerald Laird scores.
Josh Anderson singles on a fly ball to left fielder Delmon Young. Ramon Santiago scores. Josh Anderson advances to 2nd, on a fielding error by left fielder Delmon Young.
Placido Polanco reaches on a fielding error by second baseman Alexi Casilla. Josh Anderson to 3rd.
Clete Thomas triples (1) on a line drive to right fielder Michael Cuddyer. Josh Anderson scores. Placido Polanco scores.

Miguel Cabrera homers (7) on a fly ball to left field. Clete Thomas scores.
